content.rendered:
Anastasia is an associate lecturer in International business strategy, sustainability and Corporate Social Responsibility at the University of Northampton. Where she has taught, developed and assessed a wide range of undergraduate and postgraduate modules. She has also supervised a number of research students at undergraduate and postgraduate level.  Anastasia effectively managed moderations of a large number of partner Universities.

Anastasia Holds a BA (Hons) in international accounting, a Master of Business Administration from the University of Northampton. She is currently writing up her PHD Thesis. Anastasia is a member of Chartered management Institute.
